.checks {
  display: block;
  position: relative;
  margin: 20px auto; }

    padding-left: 35px;
    position: relative; }

    padding-right: 35px;
    padding-left: 0; }
  .ie8 .checks label:before,
  .ie8 .checks label:after {
    display: none; }
  .checks input[type=checkbox],
  .checks input[type=radio] {
    position: absolute;
    left: -999999px; }
    .ie8 .checks input[type=checkbox], .ie8
    .checks input[type=radio] {
      display: block;

  content: '';

  height: 20px;

    display: none; }

  right: 0;

.checks.right input[type=checkbox] ~ label:after {
  right: 0;
  left: auto; }

  background-color: #F16E00;
  border: #F16E00; }

    display: none; }

.checks input[type=checkbox] ~ label:after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  background-image: url("/obrAssets/img/icons/Tick_white.svg");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: 4px 4px;
  background-size: 100% 100%;
  background-position: center center;
  -webkit-transition: all 100ms ease-out;
  -moz-transition: all 100ms ease-out;
  transition: all 100ms ease-out;
  -webkit-transform: scale(0.001);
     -moz-transform: scale(0.001);
      -ms-transform: scale(0.001);
          transform: scale(0.001); }
  .ie8 .checks input[type=checkbox] ~ label:after {
    display: none; }

.checks input[type=checkbox]:checked ~ label:after {
  -webkit-transform: scale(1);
     -moz-transform: scale(1);
      -ms-transform: scale(1);
          transform: scale(1); }

.checks input[type=radio] ~ label {
  margin-top: 0;
  cursor: pointer; }

.checks input[type=radio] ~ label:before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 100%;
  border: 2px solid #CCCCCC; }

.checks input[type=radio] ~ label:after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  border: 6px solid #F16E00;
  background-size: 20px 20px;
  -webkit-transition: all 100ms ease-out;
  -moz-transition: all 100ms ease-out;
  transition: all 100ms ease-out;
  -webkit-transform: scale(0.001);
     -moz-transform: scale(0.001);
      -ms-transform: scale(0.001);
          transform: scale(0.001);
  border-radius: 100%; }

.checks input[type=radio]:checked ~ label:after {
  -webkit-transform: scale(1);
     -moz-transform: scale(1);
      -ms-transform: scale(1);
          transform: scale(1); }

.results {

     -moz-animation: moveToTop 0.6s ease both;
          animation: moveToTop 0.6s ease both; }

  transition: padding 0.5s ease-in-out; }

.results {
  padding-left: 55px;
  padding-right: 55px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  max-width: 1220px; }

.rs-tile {
  float: left;
  position: relative;
  height: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  -webkit-animation: snapUp 450ms backwards cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
     -moz-animation: snapUp 450ms backwards cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
          animation: snapUp 450ms backwards cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1); }
  .rs-tile:hover {
    cursor: pointer; }

.rs-tile--highlight .rs-tile__inr {
  border: 2px solid #FF7900; }

.rs-tile--highlight .rs-tile__img {
  width: 100%; }

.rs-tile.rs-tile--wide {
  width: 33.333333%; }

.rs-tile.rs-tile--tall {
  padding-top: -webkit-calc(33.333333% - 1px);
  padding-top: -moz-calc(33.333333% - 1px);
  padding-top: calc(33.333333% - 1px); }

.ie8 .rs-tile.rs-tile--tall {
  padding-top: 49.999%; }

.rs-tile__inr {
  position: absolute;
  top: 10px;
  left: 10px;
  bottom: 5px;
  right: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: 100% auto;
  background-color: white; }

.rs-tile__content {
  position: relative;
  height: 100%; }

.rs-tile__info {
  -webkit-transition: all 0.75s ease;
  -moz-transition: all 0.75s ease;
  transition: all 0.75s ease;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: white;
  padding: 10px 10px 30px 10px;
  height: 40%;
  max-height: 40%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: block;
  cursor: pointer; }

.rs-tile__title {
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  margin-top: 0;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  line-height: 1.2;
  max-height: 57px;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
  text-align: left;
  padding-right: 15px; }
  .rs-tile__title:before {
    content: '...';
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0; }
  .rs-tile__title:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    width: 1em;
    height: 1em;
    margin-top: 5px;
    background: white; }

.rs-tile__type {
  color: #F16E00; }

.rs-tile__id {
  margin-bottom: 5px; }
  .rs-tile__id a {
    color: #F16E00;
    border: none; }

.bold {
  font-weight: 700; }

.grid-view .rs-tile__id,
.grid-view .rs-tile__date {
  display: none; }

.rs-tile__desc {
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0;

  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: none;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  line-height: 19px;
  line-height: 19px;
  line-height: 1.9rem; }

.active .rs-tile__desc {
  max-height: 65px; }

.grid-view .rs-tile__links {
  width: 100%; }

.rs-tile__links {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;
  width: 140px;
  display: block;
  background: #fff; }

.rs-tile__links .bare-list {
  float: right;
  margin-right: 0; }

  display: block;
  float: left;
  margin: 0; }

.rs-tile__item--left {

.rs-tile__link {
  width: 20px;

  display: block;
  background-size: 100% auto;
  border: none;
  margin-right: 5px;
  text-indent: -9999px;
  position: relative; }
  .rs-tile__link:hover {
    border: none; }

.active .rs-tile__link.heart {
  opacity: 1; }

.rs-tile__link.heart {
  background-image: url("/obrAssets/img/icons/heart.svg"); }
  .rs-tile__link.heart:hover {
    background-image: url("/obrAssets/img/icons/heart_orange_wbg.svg"); }
  .rs-tile__link.heart.is-favourite {
    visibility: visible;
    opacity: 1;
    background-image: url("/obrAssets/img/icons/heart_orange_wbg.svg"); }

.rs-tile__link.share {
  background-image: url("/obrAssets/img/icons/Share.svg"); }
  .rs-tile__link.share:hover {
    background-image: url("/obrAssets/img/icons/Share_orange_wbg.svg"); }

.rs-tile__link.download,
.rs-tile__link.download-restricted {
  background-image: url("/obrAssets/img/icons/Download.svg"); }
  .rs-tile__link.download:hover, .rs-tile__link.download.is-active,
  .rs-tile__link.download-restricted:hover,
  .rs-tile__link.download-restricted.is-active {

.rs-tile__link.modal-view {

  .ie8 .rs-tile__link.modal-view {

  .rs-tile__link.modal-view:hover {

    .ie8 .rs-tile__link.modal-view:hover {

.rs-tile__link.flag {

.rs-tile__img {

.rs-recommended {
  position: absolute;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  padding-left: 20%;
  padding-top: 20%;
  right: 0;
  overflow: hidden; }
  .rs-recommended:before {
    content: '';
    display: block;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    margin-left: -500px;
    margin-top: -500px;
    border-left: 500px solid transparent;
    border-top: 500px solid #F16E00; }
  .rs-recommended:after {
    content: '';
    display: block;
    background-image: url("/obrAssets/img/icons/favourite.svg");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: 100% auto;
    position: absolute;
    right: 10%;
    top: 12%;
    width: 40%;
    height: 40%; }

.ie8 .rs-recommended:after {
  right: -1px;
  top: -2px;
  width: 35px;
  height: 40px; }

.rs-country-restricted {
  position: absolute;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  padding-left: 20%;
  padding-top: 20%;
  left: 0;
  overflow: hidden; }
  .rs-country-restricted:before {
    content: '';
    display: block;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-right: 500px solid transparent;
    border-top: 500px solid #F16E00;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0; }
  .rs-country-restricted:after {
    content: '';
    display: block;
    background-image: url("/obrAssets/img/icons/flag_white.svg");

    position: absolute;
    left: 10%;
    top: 10%;

/**
 *  Responsive table
 *  on mobile show table as like a list of cards
 *  based upon:
 *  Mobile first
 *
 *  Sample structure
 *
 *  <table class="responsive-table">
    <thead>
      <tr>
        <th scope="col">Heading 1</th>
        <th scope="col">Heading 2</th>
        <th scope="col">Heading 3</th>
      </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
      <tr>
        <th scope="row">Row heading</th>
        <td data-title="Heading 2">Content for heading 2</td>
        <td data-title="Heading 3">Content for heading 3</td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>
 */
.responsive-table {
  border-collapse: separate;
  margin-bottom: 1.5em;
  width: 100%;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-size: 1.5rem; }
  .responsive-table thead {
    border: 0;
    clip: rect(1px 1px 1px 1px);
    /* IE6, IE7 */
    clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
    height: 1px;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 0;
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px; }
    .responsive-table thead th {
      background-color: #666666;
      border: #999999;
      color: #fff;
      font-size: 16px;
      font-size: 16px;
      font-size: 1.6rem;
      font-weight: 600;
      padding: 15px; }
      .responsive-table thead th:first-of-type {
        text-align: left; }
  .responsive-table tbody,
  .responsive-table tr,
  .responsive-table th,
  .responsive-table td {
    clear: both;
    display: block;
    float: left;
    padding: 0;

    white-space: normal;

@-webkit-keyframes inLeft {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: translateX(-115%); }
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translateX(0); } }

@-webkit-keyframes inRight {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: translateX(115%); }
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translateX(0); } }

@-moz-keyframes inLeft {
  0% {
    -moz-transform: translateX(-115%); }
  100% {
    -moz-transform: translateX(0); } }

@-moz-keyframes inRight {
  0% {
    -moz-transform: translateX(115%); }
  100% {
    -moz-transform: translateX(0); } }

@keyframes inLeft {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: translateX(-115%);
       -moz-transform: translateX(-115%);
            transform: translateX(-115%); }
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translateX(0);
       -moz-transform: translateX(0);
            transform: translateX(0); } }

@keyframes inRight {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: translateX(115%);
       -moz-transform: translateX(115%);
            transform: translateX(115%); }
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translateX(0);
       -moz-transform: translateX(0);
            transform: translateX(0); } }

.tile-content {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  padding: 20px;
  border-bottom: 0 none; }
  .tile-content:hover {
    border-bottom: 0 none; }
  .tile-content.tile-no-pad {
    padding: 0; }
  .tile-content:after {
    content: '';
    background-image: inherit;
    position: absolute;
    background-size: 100% auto;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    -webkit-transition: all, 0.2s, ease, 300ms;
    -moz-transition: all, 0.2s, ease, 300ms;
    transition: all, 0.2s, ease, 300ms;
    z-index: 1; }
  .tile-content.no-hover:after {
    content: none; }
  .tile-content.tile--no-hover {
    -webkit-animation: none;
       -moz-animation: none;
            animation: none; }
    .tile-content.tile--no-hover:hover:after {
      -webkit-transition: none;
      -moz-transition: none;
      transition: none;
      -webkit-transform: none;
         -moz-transform: none;
          -ms-transform: none;
              transform: none; }
  .tile-content:hover:after {
    -webkit-transform: scale(1.1);
       -moz-transform: scale(1.1);
        -ms-transform: scale(1.1);
            transform: scale(1.1);
    -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.4s;
    transition: -webkit-transform 0.4s;
    -moz-transition: transform 0.4s, -moz-transform 0.4s;
    transition: transform 0.4s;
    transition: transform 0.4s, -webkit-transform 0.4s, -moz-transform 0.4s; }
